description:
Baku is in love with the only daughter of the leader of the Asanoda Yakuza, Kumiko.  Amara takes her hostage and tries to convince him to join them.  Haruhiko, a member of the Asanoda gang arrives, and his bullet strikes Kumiko.  But her wound disappears almost instantly.  It all happened because Baku wished that Kumiko would live again.
Source: crunchyroll
